## Extracting the data from FRED:

```{r cars}
library(quantmod)
cpi=getSymbols('CPIAUCSL',src='FRED',auto.assign=F)
ppi=getSymbols('PITGCG01USM661N',src='FRED',auto.assign=F)
energy=getSymbols('PNRGINDEXM',src='FRED',auto.assign=F)
food=getSymbols('PFOODINDEXM',src='FRED',auto.assign=F)
used_cars=getSymbols('CUSR0000SETA02',src='FRED',auto.assign=F)
govt_spending=getSymbols('G160371A027NBEA',src='FRED',auto.assign=F)
personal_savings_rate=getSymbols('PSAVERT',src='FRED',auto.assign=F) # in percent
```

## Merging:

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
list_ts=list(cpi,ppi,energy,food,used_cars,govt_spending,personal_savings_rate)
final_xts=do.call(merge,list_ts)
# Final object omitting all NA variables due to lack of historical data
final_xts=na.omit(final_xts)
```
